text: The 1984 National Convention of the Republican Party of the United States. It was held on August 20 to August 23, 1984, at Dallas Convention Center in downtown Dallas, Texas. The convention nominated President Ronald W. Reagan and Text of President Reagan's convention speech http://millercenter.org/president/speeches/detail/3411 Vice President George H. W. Bush for reelection. ==References== ==Other websites== * CNN: Address on Foreign Policy delivered August 20 by Jeane Kirkpatrick, Ambassador to the United Nations * C-SPAN: [rtsp://video.c-span.org/project/c04/c04072904_reagan84.rm Acceptance Speech] delivered August 23 by President Reagan Category:1984 in the United States Category:1980s in Texas Category:20th century in Dallas Category:United States presidential nominating conventions Category:Republican Party (United States) Category:August events
title: 1984 Republican National Convention
